overview: An arrogant pool owner gets the rough lesson he deserves when white-collar VS. blue-collar. A husband dressed for work can't resist his partner naked in the shower. A party planner gets surprised by a mistimed sprinkler and fucked by its owner. Two suited studs head to the shower, fully clothed, to release some tension. The cum and water fly in Wet Suited Vol.1.
title: Wet Suited
